attributes.action: Limit the use of LED headlights in cars.
attributes.additional_details: Lower the max voltage or position of lights in order not to blind oncoming traffic.
attributes.background: Research the change to LED lights in car headlights. They are blinding and cause headaches and restrict the use of driving at night. As SUV’s become more popular the headlights are higher and can blind drivers in front.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action: 

Ban LED headlights 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701233
